lexUnit.name: discouraging.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing a loss of enthusiasm, confidence or hope

sentence.text: The question centred on whatever impressions the American had gained from a discouraging experience , another failed attempt to resurrect a career that was seriously undermined by the beating he took from Mike Tyson two years ago .
History is set out in apparently discouraging detail .
Dark Woods , for instance , by the veteran French director Jacques Deray , offers a pretty discouraging experience .
